sub_title: Manager Architecture, DevOps & SaaS | Strategy, Vision & Realization | SPC | Servant & Thought Leader
summary:
Specialized in Agile Leadership and DevOps Leadership, I coach my colleagues to reach business value and safeguard the added value to the customer.

I lead my teams to be more self-organizing and encourage them to make their own decisions in their own responsibilities. I implement continuous feedback and improvements to ensure direct and open communication to strive for the best craftmanship based on trust, strategy, and agreements.

“Leading by example” is not an expression, it is a lifestyle.

Main Specialties: Agile Leadership, DevOps Leadership, Information Management, Agile Development, DevOps strategy, Multi Disciplinairy Teams, Tribes & Vision Driven Development, SAFe SPC.

school.name: HU University of Applied Sciences Utrecht (Hogeschool Utrecht)

certifications.name: Microsoft Certified: Security, Compliance, and Identity Fundamentals

projects.title: Implementation Office 365
projects.description: The implementation of Office 365 will not only be a technical implementation of the Office and the technical implementation of Enterprise Mobility and Security (EM+S). This project also will change and facilitate the Office Collaboration of Centric in the whole organization. This includes not only the change and awareness of all departments, but also the implementation of a Security Baseline for the organization.

Manager Service Management Internal IT at Centric

projects.title: Winner Open Data Battle 2015 (KNMI and Rijkswaterstaat)
projects.description: Rijkswaterstaat and KNMI collect every second of every day useful information. They can predict weather, warn for traffic jams and take measures for high water. A lot of these data sources are open and can be used by everyone. The goal is to make an app based on open data with a relevance for public, open sources, social value, creativity and innovation. Our contribution "Hier wil ik wonen"(i want to live here) has won the battle.

Windows 10 will be deployed over more than 5000 workplaces through Europe.

authors.headline: Manager Architecture, DevOps & SaaS | Strategy, Vision & Realization | SPC | Servant & Thought Leader

profile_positions.description:
Gert-Jan is asked to lead the Public Sector Solutions of Centric towards the SaaS-area in the coming years.

This means that all major applications need to be transformed in Technology, Marketing & Sales, Product Management, Service Management and Operations. The goal is to grow from our current applications and products to real sustainable services, hosted in private and public cloud.

Gert-Jan is asked by the board of Directors to lead this change,
profile_positions.title: Transformation Leader SaaS & LPM

profile_positions.description:
Centric is transforming its business from traditional software supplier to a SaaS-leadership role. To support this transformation, the organization has founded MS Public to combine Dev, Ops and DevOps to support our customers in the best way we can. Through DevOps Leadership and Agile Leadership we will add the best value for our customers.

We will lead and support the tranformation through several initiatives, from vision to realization. We are supporting our organization with people, knowledge, automation and foremost our drive.

Our employees, from Kaunas in Lithuania, in Iasz in Romania and our members in various locations in the Netherlands are ready to help!
profile_positions.title: Manager Architecture, DevOps and Application Hosting

profile_positions.description: Gert-Jan founded the DevOps organisation in Centric, together with his principal colleagues from Lithuania and Romania. The DevOps organisation is specialized in automation of all software solutions to decrease lead times, lower costs of labor and speed up the time to market of SaaS services. The CALMS framework is one of the founding pillars beneath this organisation.
profile_positions.title: Lead Principal DevOps Support Organisation

profile_positions.description:
The Centric Board asks for a route to become SaaS leading in the various areas of applications we deliver.

Centric Enterprise Innovation has formed a SaaS Transformation Team to support the whole organization to SaaS. This team initiates the changes, creates awareness to the boards and supports the various departments to change to SaaS. Agile Leadership is inevitable to change to a true SaaS company and the team is supporting this through the whole organization.

Gert-Jan is the facilitator of the program. He also facilitates the steering committee in making the fundamental decisions for the Organization.
profile_positions.title: Program Manager SaaS Transition Team

profile_positions.description: Centric Public Sector Solutions is transforming from Scrum to a Scaled Agile Framework (SAFe). Together with his fellow core team members, Gert-Jan facilitates the organisation to transform their current teams to Agile Release Trains (ART's), implementing DevOps within these trains and transforming the current processes towards Lean Portfolio Management.
profile_positions.title: Core Member Agile Tranformation Team (SAFe)

profile_positions.description:
The Centric Board has asked for the implementation of the Privacy Workspace within the whole organization. 

The Privacy Workspace is the solution on logging for the AVG / GDPR. All major Centric applications are connected to it and from this workspace, the Data Protection Officers and CISO's can manage their data, get insights and control their organization. 

Gert-Jan is the facilitator of the program and guides the project members to a successful outcome of the program. By implementing an Agile Mindset and Leadership, he guides his Multi Disciplinairy Team through the pitfalls and enforce them to be as self organizing as possible.
He also facilitates the steering committee in making the fundamental decisions for the Organization.
profile_positions.title: Program Manager

profile_positions.description:
Gert-Jan analyzes the business process and the flow of information through the process. He takes into account the organizational, economic, legal and social implications of the automation project. He provides the basis on which a project can start that part of the business can automate, or renew their current automation. Through the early years of Agile and Scrum, he guides his customers to be more Agile and have a better understanding of Agile Mindset and Agile Leadership.

Gert-Jan also supervises and advises the customers organization in gathering requirements, acceptance testing, implementation and evaluation of the system.

Experience: Requirement Analyses, UML 2.0, SCRUM, RUP, Agile Development, TMap Foundation
profile_positions.title: Information Manager / Senior Information Analyst / Product Owner

profile_positions.description: Gert-Jan trains and facilitates employees and customers in the art of process modelling. By learning a golden standard (BPMN) he coaches the customers in visualizing processes and narrowing the gap between Business and IT. In an Agile world, it's more important to visualize than to describe!
profile_positions.title: Coach / Trainer BPM(N)

profile_positions.location: Netherlands, Nordics, Romania, Belgium and Germany
profile_positions.description:
The Centric Board has asked for an implementation of Office 365 in full within the whole organization. 

Office 365 will be rolled out in Centric, based on two former projects: Windows 10 and EndPoint Security. 

The implementation of Office 365 will not only be a technical implementation of the Office and the technical implementation of Enterprise Mobility and Security (EM+S). This project also will change and facility the Office Collaboration of Centric in the whole organization. This includes not only the change and awareness of all departments, but als the implementation of a Security Baseline for the organization.

Gert-Jan is the facilitator of the project and guides the project members to a succesfull outcome of the project. He also facilitates the steering committee in making the fundamental decisions for the Organization.
profile_positions.title: Senior Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
The Internal IT department of Centric wants to have a foundation of their architectural layers and their workplaces. Based on the needs of the Business, together with maintenance of the organization and the different security and policy restrictions a foundation must be build to design the solution.

Gert-Jan is the project manager and together with his project group they will make a design, architectural standards, a desired solution and an implementation for the complete Centric Organization.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
The Internal IT department of Centric wants to implement the Enterprise edition of Windows 10 workplaces in the whole european organization.

Gert-Jan is the project manager and together with his project group they make an overall design and development strategy for the outroll of windows 10, including the full deployment in 5000 workplaces.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
Consultancy for Enterprise Innovation. The software development in our Business Unit Public Sector Solutions is on the verge of making important decisions about the future of the application portfolio. Gert-Jan consults in the decision making process.

He supports management in the verification of budgets, project plans and proofs of concept. Together they make estimations in size, finance and scalability.
profile_positions.title: Senior Consultant

profile_positions.description:
As Information Analist and Projectmanager, Gert-Jan is responsible for the internal migration of the training administration from Qualityhouse to Centric Education. 

He has made an inventory of the processes of the administration and alterred those to a new simplified workflow. In collaboration with the two companies, Gert-Jan developed a timeline for the transition. The actual migration is sceduled for october 2011.

Experience: Process Analyses, Project Management, Quality Management.
profile_positions.title: Information Analist / Business Analist / Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
Centric Housing & Healthcare is responsible for the cluster of Healthcare. Gert-Jan has worked in this cluster, where he was functionally responsible for the applications Suite4Arbo, suite4AMBU and IJZA.

Together with the whole development team, he has led those applications to a more agile and controllable development-path.

By ensuring that the client needs correctly were analyzed, he used the most modern techniques, like: UML , Use Cases, RUP and requirements analysis. 

Experience: Requirement Analyses, UML 2.0, SCRUM, RUP, Agile Development, TMap Foundation
profile_positions.title: Information Analist

profile_positions.description:
sense4SEO is a marketing company specialized in Search Engine Optimization (SEO). 

Together with the clients, Gert-Jan and his Co-owner provide an online strategy to satisfy the needs and demands of the customers, to improve the visibility in the search rankings and to target the specific audience that the clients demand.

The Company provide in SEO, SEA and SMO solutions, based on a natural and google-friendly approach, for the long term markets.
profile_positions.title: Owner / Managing Director

profile_positions.description:
The scholarship fund (formerly at the university of Leiden, now at the university of Groningen) of Anthony Hallet is one of the oldest foundations and aims for promoting the study of theologians who study at the University to prepare for the office of minister. 

The foundation was established in 1613 after the Legacy of Antony Hallet. The fund is still managed by members of the families Malapert and Cuneus, who are descendants of the female line of Anthony Hallet. Gert-Jan is member of the board and represents the Cuneus line of the family.
profile_positions.title: Member / Chairman of the Board

profile_positions.description:
Centric Norge is looking for a new Business wide financial application that can support all their activities. Under supervision of the financial board of the Nordics, the project group is looking for the solution in breaking down the desired Processes, delivering a solid IT-solution and executing the final application selection.

Gert-Jan supports the team with his experience in Business Process Management. He trains the group and reviews the processes. He has codesigned the new ERP processes from Purchase to Pay and From Order to Cash
profile_positions.title: BPM Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Leekerweide is a healthcare organization which supports and assists people with disabilities.

Leekerweide wants a web portal where they can inform, collaborate, share knowledge and to keep abreast of all developments in their field. This portal is being developed for different target groups to ensure that the right information is shared with staff, parents and clients, volunteers and external professionals.

Gert-Jan is Project Manager of the whole project, including building the portal at a third company, set up a good governancy and guiding the transition from the old intranet and the Internet to a new social environment. He is responsible for the endresult and the embedding in the whole organization.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
Gert-Jan assists the head of the IT Department in the organisation of Leekerweide. He is responsible for setting up several projects to achieve a better information strategy. 

The goal is to service a better environment for the leekerweide professionals to do their job more accurately and to achieve a better functional IT-system

From November 2012 Gert-Jan is also the Program Manager of the implementation of CURA. This is a complex and time consuming program, which is due at the first of januari 2014. He tries to achieve that the project leaders from Leekerweide will reach their goals. He supports and facilitates them in succesfully finishing their projects.
profile_positions.title: Information Manager / Program Manager

profile_positions.description:
Teva Pharmaceuticals is one of the largest companies in it's branche and delivers conventional medicins to a variety of vendors. 

Gert-Jan advises the management of the ICT department how to switch the organization to a Facility Management Organization. To achieve this goal, he's taking the various parameters under investigation. Time management, Project Management and Business-driven development are the key factors to succeed as a mature environment.

From August 2014 to june 2015 he was project manager of the SOx ICT compliance project. In this period he helped the Director of ICT and the CFO to make the dutch ICT site SOx compliant.

Gert-Jan was also the Project Manager of the Project of Vendor Managed Inventory (from may 2013 to oktober 2014) . This project is designed for wholesalers to have a better connected stock. Gert-Jan is responsible for the implementation of the Business Side, the IT side and the Financial side of the project. Together with the members of the board from Teva and the various wholesalers, he implements and monitors the projects.
profile_positions.title: Information Consultant / Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
Teva Pharmaceuticals is one of the largest companies in it's branche and delivers conventional medicins to a variety of vendors. The company is converting from the old BPCS ERP system to a new Oracle ERP system that is globally maintained.

Gert-Jan has identified the Business Owners and their responsibilities within the new ERP system. He has developed the functional requirements and the business rules for the dataconversion, has developed the test plans and has lead the business owners to execute these tests. 

Under his supervision the documentation is maintained and structured at a pragmatic manner without frustrating the business but in such a way that the documentation meets all the strict requirements of the audits of the pharmaceutic branche.

In cooperation with the director IT of Teva Pharmachemie, he has tracked the progress of the data conversion and he has informed the steering committee.
profile_positions.title: Senior Information Analyst / Conversion Manager

profile_positions.description:
As Information/Business analyst is Gert-Jan responsible for the application and work process of the primary process of Quality Assurance. 

From the first point of contact within the process until the proven result, the process must be excogitated and unified. After the inventory, the processes and the application will be unified over all the sites.

Gert-Jan works in a projectteam with the managers of the Quality Assurance Department.
profile_positions.title: Senior Informatie Analist / Senior Business Analist

profile_positions.description:
Key Developing Skills: VB.NET, SQL, ASP.NET, XML/XSD/XSLT, Webservices, HTML, CSS, VBA en Office Development, VBS en scripting, Adobe PS, Illustrator en Go Live, VS 05,08 and 10.

Project Experience: ITIL, Prince2, RUP

Office Development in Excel, Access, Visio, Word & Powerpoint. Experience with ComponentOne en Telerik.

Experience: Delphi, CMS, Java, AJAX, LINQ, Sharepoint, PHP, MySQL, C#
profile_positions.title: Software Developer

profile_positions.description:
Planning of all technical resources and people.

Restructure of the projectorganisation
profile_positions.title: Planning Technical Services

profile_positions.description:
Planning of all onsite employees and Helpdesk

Training and coördination of helpdesk-employees
profile_positions.title: Planning Technical Services Onsite
